bs-checklist-desc: Used in [{{canonicalurl:Special:WikiAdmin|mode=ExtensionInfo}} Special:WikiAdmin?mode=ExtensionInfo], description of checklist extension
bs-checklist-tag-checklist-desc:
Text for renders a checkbox or select field. Available configuration attributes:
{{Related|Bs-tag-desc}}
bs-checklist-tag-checklist-param-type: Text for type: list renders a select list. "type" has to be lowercase
bs-checklist-tag-checklist-param-list: Text for list: Name of the template with the available values. Parameter type must be set to list. "list" has to be lowercase
bs-checklist-tag-checklist-param-value: Text for value: checked or a value out of the list template. "value" has to be lowercase
bs-checklist-dlg-new-list: Button text for creating a new checklist
bs-checklist-dlg-save-list: Button text for saving changes in a checklist
bs-checklist-dlg-items-label: Label for list of checklist items
bs-checklist-dlg-items-emptytext: Text when list of checklist items is empty
bs-checklist-dlg-items-hint: Text to remind the user to hit ENTER key after adding a new item to the list
bs-checklist-dlg-panel-title: Label for the left tree panel containing the available lists
bs-checklist-dlg-new-title: Title for the add new list dialogue
bs-checklist-dlg-new-prompt: Text for the add new list prompt
bs-checklist-alert:
Title for the alert that shows up when something went wrong
{{Identical|Caution}}
bs-checklist-confirm-dirty-title: Title for the confirm dialogue for unsaved changes
bs-checklist-confirm-dirty-text: Title for the confirm dialogue for unsaved changes. Phrase it in a way that the 'yes' option is the one where the users loose their changes
